
                            
                            <div class="xdg"><p>深圳建行立减䋮10+10+20<br>3⃣️“财富成长礼”第三个10立减䋮，路径看下图，都是类似差不多的买够100留存1-3天，都买入口推荐的就行，领完立减䋮再取出！<br>————————<br>前两个去我主页站或者链接直达<br>1⃣️“财运多多体验有礼”20立减䋮<br> <a target="_blank" href="https://wap.xdglt.com/mag/circle/v1/show/wapShowView?content_id=376422&amp;p_u=120481&amp;topic_share=1&amp;themecolor=f30c5c&amp;show_type=1">https://wap.xdglt.com/mag/circle/v1/show/wapShowView?cont…</a><br>2⃣️“财富体验礼遇”10立减䋮<br><a target="_blank" href="https://wap.xdglt.com/mag/circle/v1/show/wapShowView?content_id=376450&amp;p_u=120481&amp;topic_share=1&amp;themecolor=f30c5c&amp;show_type=1">https://wap.xdglt.com/mag/circle/v1/show/wapShowView?cont…</a><img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250317/1742201972074953942.jpg"></p></div>
